text: Thomas Accipe Issorat (born 3 September 1993) is a French Guianaan footballer who currently plays for La Louvière Centre in the Belgian Second Amateur Division and the French Guiana national team. == International career == Issorat made his national team debut for French Guiana on 23 June 2017 in a 1–1 draw against Jamaica. Issorat scored his first goal and first competitive goal on 7 September 2018, scoring the opening goal in a 5–0 win against Anguilla, as part of 2019–20 CONCACAF Nations League qualifying. === International goals === :Scores and results list French Guiana's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! # !!
